Info.Title: Matty
Info.Description: Cafe founding member, software engineer, enjoys chaos. What more needs to be said?
Info.Ability: Deduction

Info.Title: Markus
Info.Description: A cafe founding member, computer scientist, and practioner of FOSS
Info.Ability: Counter-Argument

Info.Title: Shawner
Info.Description: First member to join the cafe. Really likes pools, like, alot.
Info.Ability: Fake-News

Info.Title: Bryce
Info.Description: Cafe founding member and leader. Also a 1337 HaXx0r.
Info.Ability: Hijack

Info.Title: Tan
Info.Description: Cafe founding member and practitioner of true neutrality.
Info.Ability: True-Neutral - negates all character abilities.

Info.Title: Michard Klawkins
Info.Description: A chaotic alter-ego who is known to grimlin.
Info.Ability: May discard a card to draw another once a turn.

Info.Title: Marvalo
Info.Description: A grand magician who travels the lands, seeking far and wide for his magic to understand the new spells inside.
Info.Ability: May discard two cards to draw a specific card from their deck once a turn. Deck must be shuffled afterwards.

Info.Title: The Pool Boy
Info.Description: We told you he liked pools...
Info.Ability: Cards played by this card's owner are also considered to be of the 'Pool Party' faction.

Info.Title: CyberToy-C
Info.Description: Kinda like Whaddafeck but not really. Definitely a hacker.
Info.Ability: Discard a card once a turn to prevent your opponent from looking at their hand.

Info.Title: TanTan
Info.Description: One shutters to know the thoughts behind this individual. Probably a meme.
Info.Ability: Credibility increases by 2 for every 'non-cafe' faction card on your opponents field and by 2 for every 'Cafe' faction card on your field.

Info.Title: Slavic Shawn
Info.Description: Trust me when I say a description is NOT needed.
Info.Ability: Gains 2 credibility for every card on the owner's side of the field that matches this cards faction.

Info.Title: The Stallman
Info.Description: Daedric prince of freedom.
Info.Ability: Hands can no longer be concealed while 'The Stallman' is in play

Info.Title: The Memer
Info.Description: A unit of cultural transmission - Richard Dawkins
Info.Ability: Card factions on 'The Memer's side of the field are all 'Wildcard'

Info.Title: The Salty Seafarer
Info.Description: Hardy har har, welcome to the Seafarer's Cafe.
Info.Ability: Gains 10 credibility for every 'Coffee' card in play

Info.Title: Steve Clarney
Info.Description: STEEEEEEEVE CLARNEY
Info.Ability: Gains 10 credibility for every FOSS card played.

Info.Title: Vapenatman
Info.Description: Puff... Puff...
Info.Ability: 'Pool Party' faction cards in play confer an additional 10 credibility. Cafe cards in play lose 10 credibility.

Info.Title: Dip in the Deep End
Info.Description: The 'deep end' is an analogy for a place where ideas and society die.
Info.Ability: Discard up to three cards from your hand. From the bottom of your deck, draw the number of cards you discarded

Info.Title: The Art of War
Info.Description: If fighting is sure to result in victory then you must fight! - Sun Tsu
Info.Ability: Increases a card's credibility by 5.

Info.Title: Brew up some joe!
Info.Description: What kind of cafe doesn't brew coffee?
Info.Ability: Increase a card's credibility by 4 for every 'Coffee' in play

Info.Title: Gone phishing!
Info.Description: Worth a few more bells then your average fish
Info.Ability: Discard a card. Remove credibility off an opponents card equal to the credibility of the discarded card.

Info.Title: Crack the Code
Info.Description: Doesn't apply to Linux users
Info.Ability: Roll four D6 dice. Remove credibility from an opponents card equal to the total of the four dice. Does not apply to 'Linux' faction cards

Info.Title: Exploit
Info.Description: Someone's looking a bit 'vulnerable' today...
Info.Ability: Pick a card randomly from an opponents hand. If the card does not belong to a 'Linux' faction, discard it and add its crediblity to one of your own cards

Info.Title: Crate Sickness
Info.Description: Craaaaaate Siiiiiicknesss
Info.Ability: Draw an additional card on your turn. Cards on the card owner's side of the field each lose 10 credibility for every 'Crate Sickness' card in play

Info.Title: Cafe Adventure!
Info.Description: Can comprise of a trip to the woods, a board game convention, or rarely a movie. Usually is just hanging at a house.
Info.Ability: Cafe cards in play gain an additional 10 credibility for all 'coffee' cards in play.

Info.Title: Trip to a Cafe
Info.Description: Something that will never happen.
Info.Ability: Play a 'coffee' card from your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

Info.Title: An explaination of freedom and what it means for you!
Info.Description: See - gnu.org
Info.Ability: Flips facedown cards faceup. If a 'Stallman' card is in play, double its credibility. Faceup cards gain 10 credibility.

Info.Title: Fresh Coffee
Info.Description: I do some of my best thinking over coffee. I tend to have a latte on my mind.
Info.Ability: Card's name is considered 'Coffee.' Credibility increases by one for every 'Coffee' card in play.

Info.Title: Innertube
Info.Description: Floatation fun, for everyone!
Info.Ability: Credibility is equal to the number of 'Pool Party' faction cards in play

Info.Title: Alcohol
Info.Description: Ale in a days work.
Info.Ability: Discard a non character card with less than 15 credibility off the field.

Info.Title: Loaded dice
Info.Description: You gave me LOADED DICE?!
Info.Ability: Turn 1 dice rolled this turn to any side you would like.

Info.Title: The Montage
Info.Description: Is that going in the montage?
Info.Ability: Pure 'Cafe' faction cards lose 10 credibility.

Info.Title: Water of Life
Info.Description: Some say Mark's lifeforce is tied to the bottle. Whether that be the water or plastic itself remains to be seen...
Info.Ability: The owner of this card removes factions other than 'FOSS' from multi-faction cards in play.

Info.Title: Swimsuit
Info.Description: Every suit is a swimsuit! - Shawner
Info.Ability: Credibility is equal to the number of 'Pool Party' faction cards in play

Info.Title: Scuba Gear
Info.Description: Suitable for swimming in a very large pool
Info.Ability: Credibility is equal to the number of 'Pool Party' faction cards in play x2

Info.Title: Beach Towel
Info.Description: 1 part sand repellent, 2 parts weapon
Info.Ability: Credibility is equal to the number of 'Pool Party' faction cards in play x3

Info.Title: The Pool Creed
Info.Description: I am the liner of my pool. Tile is my body, and water is my blood. Unknown to leaks. Nor known to swimmers. Have withstood pain to create many pools. Yet, those hands will never swim in them. So as I pray, unlimited P0OL works.
Info.Ability: Cards on your opponents field that are of the 'Pool Party' faction count towards your card total. Credibility generated from 'Pool Party' faction cards is doubled.

Info.Title: Mocha
Info.Description: No need to mocha anyone, just drink up!
Info.Ability: Card's name is considered 'Coffee.' Credibility increases by two for every 'Coffee' card in play.

Info.Title: Latte
Info.Description: A latte fuss about nothing.
Info.Ability: Card's name is considered 'Coffee' and counts as two 'Coffee' cards

Info.Title: Server Farm
Info.Description: Time to start some bitcoin mining!
Info.Ability: Draw two more cards.

Info.Title: Bot Net
Info.Description: Your own private virtual army.
Info.Ability: Discard a card to remove one of your opponents cards off the field.

Info.Title: Low Orbit Ion Cannon
Info.Description: 'Shit' - Some server admin as they get DDoS'd probably
Info.Ability: Opponent discards their hand.

Info.Title: Skyscapes
Info.Description: Home of they skypirates. Forever sailing the skys on large rectangles that defy physics.
Info.Ability: Player's may draw an additional card on their turn.

Info.Title: The Cafe
Info.Description: The Seafarer's Cafe. Home of the Seafarer's Cafe.
Info.Ability: All 'Coffee' cards in play are counted twice.

Info.Title: The Bistro
Info.Description: A cafe, but with superier food. This makes it better than a cafe.
Info.Ability: 'Coffee' cards in play are instead considered 'Bistro-Cusines' with their effects negated.

Info.Title: The Gastropub
Info.Description: An expensive Bistro. This also probably makes it better than a cafe.
Info.Ability: Multi-faction cards are now only considered their first faction.

Info.Title: A Hotel
Info.Description: A place to have suite dreams.
Info.Ability: Cards whose credibility reaches over 15 gain an additional 5.

Info.Title: A Convention Center
Info.Description: A tradition.
Info.Ability: Cards with the same name have their crediblity doubled.

Info.Title: A Party
Info.Description: Ain't no party like a pool party!
Info.Ability: Multi-faction cards that contain 'Cafe' lose that faction. Single-faction 'Cafe' cards become 'Wildcard.'

Info.Title: Online
Info.Description: Traveling the cyberspace highway. Or some lost meme like that.
Info.Ability: Card's on the field gain another faction of your choice.

Info.Title: Declare
Info.Description: Make a declaration or statement!
Info.Ability: Target card loses 10 credibility. Remains in play.

Info.Title: Rebuttal
Info.Description: Challenge a statement or provide evidence against!
Info.Ability: Counters a 'Declare' or 'Inform' card and remains in play if it does so.

Info.Title: Ignore
Info.Description: Ignore a rebuttal and stand your ground!
Info.Ability: Counters a 'Rebuttal' or 'Contradiction' card and remains in play if it does so. If you have a 'Pool Party' faction in play half this cards credibility and keep it in play.

Info.Title: Intimidate
Info.Description: Intimidate your foe and make your point!
Info.Ability: Counters a 'Rebuttal,' or 'Declare,' card. Remains in play

Info.Title: Lie
Info.Description: Make a statement and hash out false facts!
Info.Ability: -50 credibility if countered. Must be played in response to an 'Intimidate' card.

Info.Title: Misinform
Info.Description: Misinform your opponent and yourself to make a convincing point!
Info.Ability: Counters the ability of a lie card.

Info.Title: Contradiction
Info.Description: Make a contradiction that solidifies your arguement!
Info.Ability: Counters a 'Lie,' 'Evidence,' or 'Misinform' card and remains in play if so.

Info.Title: Purjury
Info.Description: Willfully tell a lie so powerful that is covers up the complete truth to lead to an even greater one!
Info.Ability: Uncounterable. Must be played in response to a countered 'Contradiction' card. All cards played by this owner have their faction turned to 'Chaos.'

Info.Title: Inform
Info.Description: Inform the opponent on a specific subject!
Info.Ability: Remains on the field even if countered. Counters a Contradiction.

Info.Title: Evidence
Info.Description: Provide evidence for your side in an arguement!
Info.Ability: Must be played in response to a countered 'Inform' card.

Info.Title: The Truth
Info.Description: Bring forth the truth of it all!
Info.Ability: Uncounterable. Must be played in response to a countered 'Evidence.' Double credibility of all cards on your side of the field.
